_description: TextHandler behavior configuration - auto-resize logic, keyboard shortcuts, and textarea settings

autoResize._purpose: Controls how the textarea grows and shrinks with content
autoResize._lineHeightNote: Height of single text line in pixels. MUST match CSS line-height exactly. Change 20 to 24 = taller lines
autoResize._minLinesNote: Minimum visible lines. Change 1 to 2 = taller minimum textarea
autoResize._maxLinesNote: Maximum visible lines before scrolling. Change 12 to 15 = allow more text before scroll
autoResize._minHeightNote: Calculated minimum height (lineHeight × minLines). MUST equal lineHeight × minLines
autoResize._maxHeightNote: Calculated maximum height (lineHeight × maxLines). MUST equal lineHeight × maxLines
autoResize._animationNote: Speed of height transitions. Change 0.2s to 0.1s = faster resize, 0.3s = slower resize
autoResize._criticalRelationship: minHeight = lineHeight × minLines, maxHeight = lineHeight × maxLines. These MUST stay in sync or auto-resize breaks.

keyboardShortcuts._comment: Keyboard interaction behavior for text handling
keyboardShortcuts._purpose: Defines keyboard shortcuts and their effects on text content

escapeKey._purpose: What happens when user presses Escape key
escapeKey._clearTextNote: Whether Escape clears text content. false = keep text when escaping
escapeKey._resetHeightNote: Whether Escape resets textarea to minimum height. false = keep current height

keyboardShortcuts._usage: Add new keyboard shortcuts here as features expand

textarea._purpose: Basic textarea setup and placeholder text
textarea._placeholderNote: Text shown when textarea is empty. Change to customize user guidance
textarea._initialRowsNote: Starting number of visible rows. Should match minLines for consistency

performance._purpose: Settings to ensure smooth auto-resize and text input responsiveness
performance._debounceNote: Milliseconds to debounce resize calculations. 0 = immediate, 50 = smoother on slow devices
performance._scrollNote: How scrolling behaves when content exceeds maxHeight. Options: smooth, auto, instant
